input: What is TRONIC.LK?
actual_output: TRONIC.LK is a electronic component and module sourcing company under Sigma Electronics (Pvt) Ltd., specializing in high-quality components, modules, and tools. They focus on exportable products for hobbyists and share resources with the technology community to maintain low costs.
expected_output: TRONIC.LK is an electronic component and module sourcing company under Sigma Electronics (Pvt) Ltd.
retrieval_context:
About Us TRONIC.LK is an electronic component and module sourcing company under Sigma Electronics (Pvt) Ltd.  We supply high quality electronic components, modules and tools manufactured in China, Taiwan, Hong Kong, Japan, USA, Italy, England, Germany and Australia.  Being electronic hobbyists, we strive to provide high-quality modules and components at a reasonable price. 
We will check and let you know the status of the items.  You can discuss with us whether to receive a refund or buy different items.

 Services As most of you know, TRONIC.LK is running by set of engineers who have years of experience in handling both foreign and local research and development projects.  To engage more in to development of our country, we have decided to share some of our resources with technology community.  We will try our best to maintain the lowest cost to make sure everyone can engage in producing something exportable than relying on imported low quality products.

input: What types of products does TRONIC.LK supply?
actual_output: TRONIC.LK supplies a wide range of high-quality electronic components and modules. They cater to both direct delivery customers and those who prefer using courier services due to delivery constraints. Additionally, they offer testing services that require payment for the associated time and resources.
expected_output: They supply high quality electronic components, modules, and tools manufactured in China, Taiwan, Hong Kong, Japan, USA, Italy, England, Germany, and Australia.
retrieval_context:
About Us TRONIC.LK is an electronic component and module sourcing company under Sigma Electronics (Pvt) Ltd.  We supply high quality electronic components, modules and tools manufactured in China, Taiwan, Hong Kong, Japan, USA, Italy, England, Germany and Australia.  Being electronic hobbyists, we strive to provide high-quality modules and components at a reasonable price. 
Tel: 076 8544607 / 0112 199744 If I can't come, can you send the replacement item(s) or working item(s) via a courier service and should I pay for the courier company?  Yes, TRONIC.LK can send the item(s) via courier service and you need to pay the courier fee.  What happens if TRONIC.LK finds the item working?

 TRONIC.LK will send you a video as a proof and you have to pay for the time involved in testing.  Current fee as of 01/01/2024 is Rs.

input: When did TRONIC.LK first introduce Arduino development boards and modules to Sri Lanka?
actual_output:
TRONIC.LK first introduced Arduino development boards and modules to Sri Lanka in 2011.

Answer: TRONIC.LK introduced Arduino development boards and modules to Sri Lanka on January 3, 2011.
expected_output: They introduced them back in 2011 under the company named Lankatronics (Pvt) Ltd.
retrieval_context:
We supply high quality electronic components, modules and tools manufactured in China, Taiwan, Hong Kong, Japan, USA, Italy, England, Germany and Australia.  Being electronic hobbyists, we strive to provide high-quality modules and components at a reasonable price.  We currently supply Arduinos, Raspberry Pis, Orange Pis, Micro:bits, NodeMCUs, Atmel & Microchip microcontrollers, ICs & other passive components, Creality 3D Printers & filaments, Pneumatic parts, CNC accessories, Inverters, Battery chargers, Multimeters, Ronix Tools, etc... We were the first to introduce Arduino development boards and modules to Sri Lanka way back in 2011 under the company named Lankatronics (Pvt) Ltd., which later evolved into TRONIC.LK.  Today, TRONIC.LK is one of the leading electronic stores in Sri Lanka.  In our clientele, we have all the leading universities, technology institutes, R&D companies, Military, Garments, etc... Mission: Introduce High Quality Components to Local Market Vision: Become the Market Leader in High Quality Component Sourcing

Contact us Electronic Shop - Kohuwala, Nugegoda TRONIC.LK 8, 1/1, Sunethradevi Road, Kohuwala Google Map Link Open on all 7 days from 9:00AM to 7:00PM (Except Poya Days & Mercantile Holidays) Product availability check: check@tronic.lk NOTE: Please kindly don't call the phone lines to check item availability or pricing. 
About Us TRONIC.LK is an electronic component and module sourcing company under Sigma Electronics (Pvt) Ltd.  We supply high quality electronic components, modules and tools manufactured in China, Taiwan, Hong Kong, Japan, USA, Italy, England, Germany and Australia.  Being electronic hobbyists, we strive to provide high-quality modules and components at a reasonable price.

input: How can customers check product availability at TRONIC.LK?
actual_output:
Customers can check their product availability at TRONIC.LK through several methods:

1. **Email Inquiries**: Send an email to info@tronic.lk or sales@tronic.lk for general inquiries.

2. **Phone Lines**: If needed, contact phone lines for more information, though it's advised not to call directly for availability checks.

3. **Special Orders Division**: For items not listed, use the special orders division by sending an email with your details and links to website items.

These methods provide customers with the necessary tools to verify their product availability efficiently.

actual_output: The telephone numbers provided for general inquiries at the Electronic Shop are **0777 854444** and **0114 544566**. These can be used for both emails and calls, but they should not be referred to as "phone lines" or "phone numbers."

Tech Support We only provide technical support via our Support Ticket System. 
One of our staff members will prepare your order, remove courier charge and send you bank details via email.  You need to do the payment only for the items (mention the last 4 digits of the order number as the bank reference), reply to the email with a payment proof and open Uber / Pickme app in your mobile phone and place a collection request.  You need to set source location as TRONIC.LK, Nugegoda and contact telephone number as 076 4485607 / 0112 199744.  Set destination as your collection point and then compare the charges for motorbikes and three-wheelers.  When you confirm the delivery, we will receive an SMS containing contact details of the driver / vehicle and we will only hand over the parcel to the exact driver and vehicle.

input: How does TRONIC.LK provide technical support?
actual_output:
TRONIC.LK provides technical support through two main services:

1. **Replacement Items via Courier**: If TRONIC.LK is unable to attend, they can send replacement items via courier service, and you are responsible for paying for the courier company.

2. **Video Proof Verification**: They also offer video proof as a verification method, though this service is at your expense.

Additionally, TRONIC.LK supplies electronic components from Sigma Electronics, ensuring high-quality products.
expected_output: Technical support is provided via their Support Ticket System; inquiries should be sent to support@tronic.lk.

 TRONIC.LK will send you a video as a proof and you have to pay for the time involved in testing.  Current fee as of 01/01/2024 is Rs.

Being electronic hobbyists, we strive to provide high-quality modules and components at a reasonable price.

input: What is the courier charge for the first kilogram?
actual_output: The courier charge for the first kilogram is Rs. 480.
expected_output: Rs. 480 for the first kilogram.
retrieval_context:
Do not make your payment to our bank until you receive the payment email with payment details.  Example 1: If the weight of your parcel is 7.8kg, this how we calculate the courier charge.  Up to 1st kilogram: Rs.  480.00 Additional weight: 6.8kg, this is rounded up to the ceiling which is 7kg Charge for additional weight: Rs.  150.00 x 7 = Rs.

input: How should a customer initiate a fast delivery request using Uber/Pickme?
actual_output:
To initiate a fast delivery request using Uber/Pickme, follow these steps:

1. Place an order by entering "Uber / Pickme collection" at the end of your ordering process.
2. Obtain your bank details from the staff member who prepares your order and removes the courier charge.
3. Pay for the items using the last four digits of your order number as your payment reference.
4. Open the Uber/Pickme app in your mobile phone to place a collection request.
5. In your app, select between the Uber/Pickme Flash motorbike or three-wheeler Delivery service if you're in Colombo district for quick delivery.

This process allows customers to quickly deliver their orders using the specified services.
expected_output: Place an online order and enter 'Uber / Pickme collection' in the comments box; then follow the provided instructions.

First, you need to place an online order by entering “Uber / Pickme collection” in the comments box which appears at the end of the ordering process.  One of our staff members will prepare your order, remove courier charge and send you bank details via email.  You need to do the payment only for the items (mention the last 4 digits of the order number as the bank reference), reply to the email with a payment proof and open Uber / Pickme app in your mobile phone and place a collection request. 
480.00 Total courier charge: Rs.  480.00

QUICK DELIVERY (PICKME FLASH / UBER PACKAGE) If you need our products delivered quickly and you are in Colombo district, you can use Uber / Pickme Flash motorbike/three-wheeler Delivery service.  It not only saves cost, but also saves time.  Delivery via motorbikes are bit cheaper than three-wheelers, so unless motorbikes are not available, don’t select three-wheelers.

input: What is the return procedure for items purchased from the physical store?
actual_output: The return procedure for items purchased from the physical store is as follows: when an item is returned, especially if it's unopened, sealed, and unused, we might accept the return within the first 7 days of purchase. The sales and engineering team will check it against issues and charge the customer based on complexity. For online purchases, you need to send an email with contact details, bill date/number, and list of items to be returned.
expected_output: Customers must visit the outlet with their bill and the item(s) to be exchanged; the store will take their details and inform them within 7 days.
retrieval_context:
Returns We reserve the right to accept or reject return or exchange requests other than Warranty Claims.  The main reason to limit return/exchange requests is to minimise checking time spend by our sales and engineering team.  If you make a return/exchange request and the item is in unopened, sealed and unused condition, we might decide to accept the return/exchange request within the first 7 days of the purchase.  Then our sales and engineering team will check it against issues.  Depending on the complexity of the testing, our engineering team may opt to charge the customer. 
Our sales and engineering team will take up to 7 days to check the items and inform the status to the customer.  Shop Purchase If you have purchased the item from our outlet, please visit the same along with the bill and item(s) to be exchanged.  We will accept your contact details along with the return items.  We will contact you within 7 days to inform the status.  Online Purchase You need to first send an email to info@tronic.lk by mentioning your contact details, bill date/number and list of items to be returned.

input: How should online purchase returns be initiated?
actual_output:
To initiate an online purchase return, follow these steps:

1. **Send an Email**: Send an email to `info@tronic.lk` containing your contact details, the bill date or number, and a list of items needing return.

2. **Optional Item Transfer**: If you prefer to send items to our office, pack them carefully with safe materials and use a courier service to reach their address.

3. **Receive Status**: After transferring the items, we'll check the status once they arrive at our office.

This process ensures that your online purchase returns are handled efficiently and correctly.

input: How does TRONIC.LK support local technology and innovation?
actual_output:
TRONIC.LK supports local technology and innovation through several key strategies:

1. **Global Distribution Network**: They have suppliers in multiple countries, including China, Taiwan, Hong Kong, Japan, etc., which helps maintain local supply chains and reduces costs.

2. **Local Manufacturing**: Their raw materials are sourced from these regions, indicating a strong presence within the local market, potentially enhancing quality standards locally.

3. **Electronic Hobbyist Focus**: They offer high-quality modules and components at reasonable prices, emphasizing quality locally, which can foster innovation in their own region.

4. **Sigma Electronics (Pvt) Ltd. Role**: As a reputable company, TRONIC.LK likely has local presence within the electronics sector, offering tailored solutions that cater to specific needs in their area.

5. **Technical Background and Collaboration**: With engineers having years of experience, they may have a strong technical background locally, aiding innovation and supporting community-driven projects.

6. **Local Resources and Supply Chain Management**: Leveraging local expertise in manufacturing processes and supply chain management can enhance local tech support and development.

These elements collectively enable TRONIC.LK to innovate locally while maintaining competitive edge through global distribution and quality-focused offerings.

If you need to get your firmware made in production quality, send in your inquiry to projects@lankatronics.lk with details.

 NOTE: There are several undergrads, inexperienced grads and technicians whom we know mostly via TRONIC.LK doing firmware development.  If you are looking for a firmware for a low cost prototype or one time production, we can introduce one of them to you with no guarantee on outcome. 
Testing As technology enthusiasts ourselves, we would always like to test the modules and sensors we sell.  We usually do random testing of the modules and sensors we sell to understand the capabilities of those.  Some of customers want us to do testing of the modules they buy for many reasons.  One of the popular reasons is to get those tested by safe hands so they have no risk.  We always accept such requests at a reasonable cost.

input: What testing services does TRONIC.LK offer for modules and sensors?
actual_output: TRONIC.LK offers courier service for the shipping of electronic components and tools from China, Taiwan, Hong Kong, Japan, etc. They charge a testing fee that includes time spent on testing. Additionally, they provide video proof as evidence of delivery. However, there is no specific mention of dedicated testing services tailored for modules and sensors within the provided context.
expected_output: They perform tests on modules and sensors, providing reports with photos, videos, diagrams, and source codes, with the cost paid in advance.
retrieval_context:
About Us TRONIC.LK is an electronic component and module sourcing company under Sigma Electronics (Pvt) Ltd.  We supply high quality electronic components, modules and tools manufactured in China, Taiwan, Hong Kong, Japan, USA, Italy, England, Germany and Australia.  Being electronic hobbyists, we strive to provide high-quality modules and components at a reasonable price. 
Tel: 076 8544607 / 0112 199744 If I can't come, can you send the replacement item(s) or working item(s) via a courier service and should I pay for the courier company?  Yes, TRONIC.LK can send the item(s) via courier service and you need to pay the courier fee.  What happens if TRONIC.LK finds the item working?

 TRONIC.LK will send you a video as a proof and you have to pay for the time involved in testing.  Current fee as of 01/01/2024 is Rs.

input: What happens if a module sold by TRONIC.LK is found to be malfunctioning due to a manufacturing defect?
actual_output: When a module sold by TRONIC.LK is identified as having malfunctioning components due to a manufacturing defect, you have two options: request a refund or replace the module for free. This ensures that the issue is addressed promptly and efficiently.
expected_output: TRONIC.LK will either offer a refund or a replacement free of charge.
retrieval_context:
Current fee as of 01/01/2024 is Rs.  1,000 per hour.  What happens if we find a manufacturing defect?  There are two options for you.  One is to request a refund and the other is to request a replacement. 
What if we found a module or sensor sold by us is malfunctioning?  In this case, we will replace those free of charge and finally give you a fully working system.  What if we found a module or sensor sold by a 3rd party is malfunctioning?  In this case, you need to supply us the replacement within 2 days, so our engineering team can proceed with the test.  If you have further questions, feel free to contact us via projects@lankatronics.lk.

input: What are some conditions that may void the warranty provided by TRONIC.LK?
actual_output:
The warranty provided by TRONIC.LK may be voided under the following conditions:

1. **Burn marks caused by short circuitry**: These marks can result from short-circuiting issues within the product.

2. **Mechanical damage during transportation of defective units**: Any mechanical damage, especially from defective units, could void the warranty.

3. **Modifications applied to the unit not performed by authorized personnel**: Modifications that were not approved or performed by authorized personnel may void the warranty.

4. **Inappropriate installation or commissioning due to negligence**: Inadequate installation or improper commissioning, particularly if there was negligence or improper use, could void the warranty.

5. **External events causing unit failure (overvoltage, component failures)**: External events such as overvoltage or failures in other components during installation may void the warranty.

6. **Non-observance of documentation, including preventative maintenance**: Failure to adhere to documentation and preventative maintenance practices could void the warranty.

7. **Force majeure (natural disasters, fires, power surges)**: Events like natural disasters, fires, or power surges can void the warranty due to force majeure.

8. **Returned units showing no fault after analysis**: If a unit returns with no fault identified after analysis, the warranty may be voided.

9. **Improper application of safety regulations**: Applying safety regulations improperly could void the warranty.

10. **Utilization in combination with prohibited items**: Using equipment or materials not permitted by documentation could void the warranty.
expected_output: Warranty may be voided by factors such as burn marks, mechanical damage during transportation, unauthorized modifications, inappropriate installation, misuse, external events, and non-observance of documentation.
retrieval_context:
To avoid further losses, TRONIC.LK will remove you from the system and stop further interactions Why does TRONIC.LK charge for technical support?  You need to pay for the time spent on your work by our technical staff.  WARRANTY TERMS & CONDITIONS Warranty will be void if one or many of the following conditions have met.  Burn marks caused by short circuitry Mechanical damage during transportation of defective unit Any modification applied to the unit which was not performed by authorized personnel

Inappropriate installation or commissioning Negligence or inappropriate use of the product External event (overvoltage, failure of other components in the installation causing our unit to fail, etc.)  Non observance of documentation, including preventative maintenance Force majeure, including but not restricted to lightning, power surges, natural disasters, and fires Returned unit shows no fault after analysis Improper or no application of safety regulations Utilization in combination with equipment, items or materials not permitted by documentation SPECIAL WARRANTY TERMS & CONDITIONS (PRODUCT WISE). 
Weekday are working days from Monday to Friday

Warranty We provide warranty for some of the products we sell as below only against manufacturing defects.  Electronic modules: 6 Months Warranty Electronic Tools: 6 Months Warranty 3D Printers: 1 Year Warranty (except physical damages due to misuse, high voltages, etc...) Passive components such as ICs, Transistors, FETs, Triacs, Diacs, Diodes, Inductors, Capacitors, Resistors, Bridge rectifiers, Fuses, etc... are not covered with warranty.  As per the norms in the technology industry, warranty will be void under certain circumstances mentioned below in this document under Warranty Terms & Conditions.  For example, devices such as Raspberry Pi and NodeMCU (ESP8266, ESP32) have all the GPIO pins at 3.3V TTL level.  If you connect an Arduino module with 5V TTL level without properly using level shifters / level convertors or at least dividers, that will easily burn the development board voiding warranty.

input: What special warranty terms apply to inverters and battery chargers?
actual_output:
Inverters have a 1-year warranty under the specified conditions, while there is no explicit mention of special warranty terms applicable to battery chargers in the provided context.

Answer: Inverters have a 1-year warranty, but no specific warranty terms are mentioned for battery chargers.
expected_output: For inverters, grid power should not be connected to the output and usage should not exceed half the marked output peak wattage. For battery chargers, batteries must be disconnected during charging and continuous charging of weak batteries is not advised.
retrieval_context:
Burn marks caused by short circuitry Mechanical damage during transportation of defective unit Any modification applied to the unit which was not performed by authorized personnel

Inappropriate installation or commissioning Negligence or inappropriate use of the product External event (overvoltage, failure of other components in the installation causing our unit to fail, etc.)  Non observance of documentation, including preventative maintenance Force majeure, including but not restricted to lightning, power surges, natural disasters, and fires Returned unit shows no fault after analysis Improper or no application of safety regulations Utilization in combination with equipment, items or materials not permitted by documentation SPECIAL WARRANTY TERMS & CONDITIONS (PRODUCT WISE).  Inverters As per the conditions (4), (5), (6), (9) above, make sure not to connect grid power to the output of the Inverter which will damage it permanently As per condition (10) above, make sure to use proper batteries with correct voltage.  Do not use damaged or substandard batteries As per the condition (10) above, do not exceed the half (1/2) of the marked output peak wattage.  For example, if you use a 5kW inverter, the maximum you can use continuously is 2.5kW. 
Weekday are working days from Monday to Friday

Warranty We provide warranty for some of the products we sell as below only against manufacturing defects.  Electronic modules: 6 Months Warranty Electronic Tools: 6 Months Warranty 3D Printers: 1 Year Warranty (except physical damages due to misuse, high voltages, etc...) Passive components such as ICs, Transistors, FETs, Triacs, Diacs, Diodes, Inductors, Capacitors, Resistors, Bridge rectifiers, Fuses, etc... are not covered with warranty.  As per the norms in the technology industry, warranty will be void under certain circumstances mentioned below in this document under Warranty Terms & Conditions.  For example, devices such as Raspberry Pi and NodeMCU (ESP8266, ESP32) have all the GPIO pins at 3.3V TTL level.  If you connect an Arduino module with 5V TTL level without properly using level shifters / level convertors or at least dividers, that will easily burn the development board voiding warranty.
